```{r setup, include=F}
library(lubricity)
```

```{r}
df <- read.delim(system.file("extdata", "feature.tsv", package = "lubricity"))
countries <- unique(df$country)
df.country <- lapply(countries, adminify_delim, delim = "[:,]")
df.country <- data.frame(country = countries, do.call(rbind, df.country))
df.country[order(df.country$country), ]
```
